negotiator.session

Class Turn

  • java.lang.Object
    • negotiator.session.Turn

  • public class Turn
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a single turn in the negotiation session. Turn objects are contained in Round objects which are in their turn contained in a Session object. A single Turn is executed by a single NegotiationParty. A party is however, allowed to have multiple turns in a single round.
    Author:
    David Festen
